original_text: He will never enjoy the good things that the earth provides. He will not enjoy the honey and milk which pours out like rivers of water. He will never enjoy the good things that the earth provides.
korean_text: 그는 강 곧 꿀과 엉긴 젖이 흐르는 강을 보지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: He will never enjoy the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 결코 좋은 것들을 누리지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: He will not enjoy the honey and milk
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 꿀과 젖을 누리지 못할 것이다

sentences.original_text: which pours out like rivers of water.
He will never enjoy the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 결코 좋은 것들을 누리지 못할 것이다
